title: Global Strategic Mgt
description: This course provides a forum for the analysis of managerial and organizational demands associated with effectively competing in global industries. Students will learn strategic concepts, analytical frameworks, and heuristics for taking strategic decisions in the global context, such where to compete around the globe, which products and services to offer in which locations, where to locate business operations, and how to organize and effectively coordinate global activities
